title: 1hero.ai | Home
introduction: 1hero AI is an AI chatbot designed for e-commerce customer service, providing 24/7 instant support in multiple languages. It autonomously responds to post-sales and pre-sales inquiries, integrates with various e-commerce tools, and offers features like email integration, social media support, AI chatbot, phone support, and deep e-commerce platform integration.
features: Social media support for instant responses
Deep e-commerce platform integration for order management and more
Tailored responses for post-sales and pre-sales support
Draft mode and Full Auto Mode available

faqs.question: In how many languages does 1hero generate replies?
Does 1hero integrate with Shopify backend for customer data?
faqs.answer: Yes, 1hero pulls relevant customer data from Shopify backend.

faqs.question: Does 1hero require manual copy-pasting for email replies?
faqs.answer: No, 1hero does not require manual copy-pasting for email replies.
